articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The number of Americans seeking unemployment benefits rose last week to 770,000, a sign that layoffs remain high even as much of the U.S. economy is steadily recovering from the...

articles.title: Woman, 95, 'totally incapacitated' after receiving 2 doses of COVID-19 vaccine a day apart - WESH Orlando
articles.description: The woman became increasingly confused after each dose of the vaccine, but after the third, her condition dramatically changed for the worse.
articles.content:
TORONTO, ON —Related video above: Mix up sends man to the hospital after he gets two vaccines in one day
